title: Queen of flowers
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Oxley Hughan and John Cooper
brief_description: The rose has been the world’s favourite flower for over 4,000 years. Becasue of the most favourable climate in new Zealand, roses flourish, and New Zealanders are amongst the world’s keenest growers of this beautiful flower.
